headline.print_headline: A Look at How Dollar Tree, Family Dollar Differ
headline.main: A Look at How Dollar Tree, Family Dollar Differ

lead_paragraph: Dollar Tree is stepping up its fight for penny-pinching customers. On Monday, the discounter said it would acquire rival discounter Family Dollar for $8.5 billion, making it the biggest player in the dollar store category. The acquisition comes as Wal-Mart Stores Inc. is going after lower-income customers with smaller stores. Despite their names, Dollar Store and Family Dollar vary in their business models.
